remarks: The scalar sigma map is one-to-one.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmap11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmap11.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmap11.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmap11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmap11.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmap11.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmap11.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
hgmap11.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
hgmap11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( G ` X ) = ( G ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
